title: Inflammatory Bowel Disease Management
content: Inflammatory bowel disease (Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis) management focuses on inducing and maintaining remission. Treatment options include 5-ASA compounds, corticosteroids, immunomodulators, and biologic agents targeting specific inflammatory pathways. Therapy is individualized based on disease phenotype, extent, and severity. Regular monitoring for disease activity and medication adverse effects is essential.
